Html:
Members of my team are getting slightly different behaviour from the compiler. As an attempt to rectify this we all unistalled and installed version 1.0RC however when I check the version number of tsc.exe I see that it is 0.9.30220.0. How can I check the versions that we have installed?

Thanks

You should run tsc.exe and check its output:
D:\git>tsc
Version 0.9.5.0
Syntax:   tsc [options] [file ..]

(more)
The actual file version of tsc.exe itself isn't very relevant (though honestly I'm not sure why that is).
Sorry forgot to say thanks, that was helpful.
